work.title: work
work.noProjects: No projects found. Add some projects in the admin panel.

about.title: about
about.description: For the past twenty-nine years, I have dedicated myself to transforming ideas into television programs. During this time, I have led all stages of development and production, learning each step of the process along the way.
about.paragraph2: My career includes experiences at renowned production companies, including Cinefilm, where I served as General Manager, supervising results, expanding business, and providing creative and strategic solutions for projects and clients.
about.paragraph3: My experience spans from creative conception to execution of complex projects, always with a focus on excellence and innovation. I work with renowned talents and companies in Brazil, Argentina, and Europe.
about.paragraph4: I am known for my ability to unite artistic vision and business strategy, creating unique solutions for each project and facilitating co-productions between different markets.
about.paragraph6: My commitment to quality and innovation makes me a reference in the Brazilian and international audiovisual market, always seeking to elevate the standard of excellence in each project.

hertzriken.title: Hertzriken
hertzriken.description: A bespoke production company dedicated to co-productions and international services. We specialize in bringing creative visions to life through strategic partnerships and innovative storytelling approaches.

consultancy.title: Consultancy
consultancy.description: Partnering with businesses, projects, and initiatives in content and entertainment. Our expertise spans across project development, production strategy, and market positioning.

learning.title: Learning
learning.description: Providing training and innovation-driven activities. We offer workshops, masterclasses, and educational programs for aspiring filmmakers and industry professionals.

contact.title: contact
contact.description: I'm always open to new opportunities and creative partnerships. Get in touch to discuss how I can contribute to your next project.

footer.description: Executive Producer specialized in development, production and strategy of audiovisual content.
